ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(ContactId), ISBLANK(Referral_Contact__c), RecordTypeId = "012700000001U2z", NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Admin")), $Profile.Name != 'Sales Enablement', $Profile.Name != '2008-09 HRS 4S Operations B', $User.Job_Name__c != 'Sales Representative', $User.Job_Name__c != 'District Sales Manager', $User.Job_Name__c != 'District Sales Assistant' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please associate a Contact or a Referral Contact to this Case!
